verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁבַֽע־ <S%H7651><s%> seven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְפֶ֖קַח <S%H6492><s%> of Pekah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְמַלְיָ֑הוּ <S%H7425><s%> of Remaliah מָלַ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> began to reign אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹתָ֖ם <S%H3147><s%> of Jotham מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> Twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years אָחָ֣ז <S%H271><s%> [was] Ahaz בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and did הַיָּשָׁ֗ר <S%H3477><s%> not [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֛י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֖יו <S%H430><s%> his God כְּדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> like David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> and even אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> yea and made his son הֶעֱבִ֣יר <S%H5674><s%> to pass through בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire כְּתֹֽעֲבוֹת֙ <S%H8441><s%> according to the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom הוֹרִ֤ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> cast out יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְזַבֵּ֧חַ <S%H2076><s%> And he sacrificed וַיְקַטֵּ֛ר <S%H6999><s%> and burnt incense בַּבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> in the high places וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הַגְּבָע֑וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and on the hills וְתַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <S%H7488><s%> and under every green

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> came up רְצִ֣ין <S%H7526><s%> Then Rezin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲ֠רָם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וּפֶ֨קַח <S%H6492><s%> and Pekah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son רְמַלְיָ֧הוּ <S%H7425><s%> of Remaliah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to war וַיָּצֻ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6696><s%> and they besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אָחָ֔ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> but יָכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> but could לְהִלָּחֵֽם׃ <S%H3898><s%> not overcome

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he הֵ֠שִׁיב <S%H7725><s%> recovered רְצִ֨ין <S%H7526><s%> Rezin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָ֤ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵילַת֙ <S%H359><s%> Elath לַֽאֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> Aram וַיְנַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H5394><s%> and drave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְהוּדִ֖ים <S%H3064><s%> the Jews מֵֽאֵיל֑וֹת <S%H359><s%> from Elath [וַאֲרַמִּים כ] (וַֽאֲדֹומִים֙ <S%H726><s%> Syrian ק) בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אֵילַ֔ת <S%H359><s%> to Elath וַיֵּ֣שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> there unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> So Ahaz מַלְאָכִ֗ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תִּ֠גְלַת פְּלֶ֤סֶר <S%H8407><s%> to Tiglathpileser מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> I [am] thy servant וּבִנְךָ֖ <S%H1121><s%> and thy son אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I עֲלֵ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> come up וְהוֹשִׁעֵ֜נִי <S%H3467><s%> and save מִכַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> me out of the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲרָ֗ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וּמִכַּף֙ <S%H3709><s%> and out of the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַקּוֹמִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> which rise up עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> And Ahaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold הַנִּמְצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> that was found בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וּבְאֹֽצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> and in the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent לְמֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria שֹֽׁחַד׃ <S%H7810><s%> [it for] a present

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> against מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וַיַּעַל֩ <S%H5927><s%> went up מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto him for the king אַשּׁ֤וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against דַּמֶּ֙שֶׂק֙ <S%H1834><s%> against Damascus וַֽיִּתְפְּשֶׂ֔הָ <S%H8610><s%> and took וַיַּגְלֶ֖הָ <S%H1540><s%> it and carried [the people of] it captive קִ֑ירָה <S%H7024><s%> to Kir וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְצִ֖ין <S%H7526><s%> Rezin הֵמִֽית׃ <S%H4191><s%> and slew

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king אָחָ֡ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz לִ֠קְרַאת <S%H7125><s%> to meet תִּגְלַ֨ת פִּלְאֶ֤סֶר <S%H8407><s%> Tiglathpileser מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria דּוּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> to Damascus וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּדַמָּ֑שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> that [was] at Damascus וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and king אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אוּרִיָּ֣ה <S%H223><s%> to Urijah הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּמ֧וּת <S%H1823><s%> the fashion הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּבְנִית֖וֹ <S%H8403><s%> and the pattern לְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all מַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <S%H4639><s%> of it according to all the workmanship

וַיִּ֛בֶן <S%H1129><s%> built אוּרִיָּ֥ה <S%H223><s%> And Urijah הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar כְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> had sent הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> according to all that king אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz מִדַּמֶּ֗שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> from Damascus כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> thus עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> made אוּרִיָּ֣ה <S%H223><s%> so Urijah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> before בּ֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> came הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> [it] against king אָחָ֖ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz מִדַּמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <S%H1834><s%> from Damascus

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> was come הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> And when the king מִדַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> from Damascus וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar וַיִּקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> approached הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> to the altar וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> and offered עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיַּקְטֵ֤ר <S%H6999><s%> And he burnt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹֽלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5930><s%> his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִנְחָת֔וֹ <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering וַיַּסֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5258><s%> and poured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִסְכּ֑וֹ <S%H5262><s%> his drink offering וַיִּזְרֹ֛ק <S%H2236><s%> and sprinkled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> the blood הַשְּׁלָמִ֥ים <S%H8002><s%> of his peace offerings אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֖וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַנְּחֹשֶׁת֮ <S%H5178><s%> also the brasen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> which [was] before יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיַּקְרֵ֗ב <S%H7126><s%> And he brought מֵאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the forefront הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house מִבֵּין֙ <S%H996><s%> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> from between the altar וּמִבֵּ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and put אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> side הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> it on the north
